Evaluation_Questions: How well did this course, to the extent promised in the syllabus, enable “conversation across lines of difference,” integrate practical and theoretical concerns, or consider and integrate issues of class, gender/sexuality, race/ethnicity, dis/ability, and or global/cultural diversity
Comments_Questions: What was the name of your practicum instructor
What were her/his strengths or weaknesses
Comments_List: Because we were dealing with Community Policing, I had to do a 'Ride-Along' in the community for 4 hours with Officer Matthew Stevens. This was a very insightful and essential component to this course because of the up close view of what the Police and the community face on a daily basis.
I went on a ride along with Officer Caldron
Officer Caldron was very interactive and very engaging and was excellent at facilitating my learning.
